documentation.author: Cerner/Updates by Terry Wright
documentation.purpose: Alert the clinician to a documented excipient allergy when an order is placed for medication which contains that excipient.
documentation.explanation: The rule evokes when a medication order is placed. If the medication product contains thimerosal, sulfites, castor oil, peanuts, poultry/eggs, pork or fish, the patient allergy profile is checked for an allergy. If an allergy is documented, an alert is sent warning of allergy and recommending discontinuation of the order. The original filename received from Cerner was PHA_STD_EXCIPENTALLERG8.
documentation.query: July 2010 Update Peanut Allergy: propofol added Fish Allergy: APAP/diphenhydramine/phenylephrine added Pork Allergy: liver derivative complex added Castor Oil Allergy: amoxicillin, flurandrenolide topical, lopinavir-rotinavir, rotinavir, travoprost ophthalmic removed; multivitamins with minerals; mupirocin topical; pancrelipase; pramipexole added Egg-containing compound, egg-containing compound, poultry allergy: rabies vaccine removed; rabies vaccine, purified chick embryo cell added Sulfite allergy: ASA/carisoprodol/codeine; sincalide added
documentation.impact:
Build excipient allergies in CMT_TOOL.exe: Vocabulary is Allergy; Term is client-defined; Principle type is Allergy.
Client may filter by application, user and/or location as determined by site-specific needs.
- E2, L2, L4, L7, L10, L13, L16, L19, L22, L25, L28, L31, L34, L37 and L40 will need to be reinstantiated with client specific database build.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_DETAIL_E
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS where order detail ORDER_DETAIL QUALIFIER LIST1 and OPT_LIST2

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_APPLICATION_E
templateDefinitions.definition: The application being used QUALIFIER APPLICATION
templateDefinitions.description: Application that generated the evoking event

statements.statement: select Application_Name = ap.description, _hidden = ap.application_number from application ap where ap.active_ind = 1 /*and (ap.direct_access_ind = 1 or ap.application_number in (961000,600005,380000)) */ and ap.application_number > 0 and ap.description > " " order application_name

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_INCOMING_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains an order ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS whose ordering physician OPT_QUALIFIER in OPT_ORDDOC and OPT_ORDER_DETAIL OPT_DETAIL_QUALIFIER OPT_LIST

statements.statement: select if (par1 ="OTHER") from prsnl pl where pl.name_full_formatted != " " and pl.name_full_formatted not between "0*" and "Z*" and pl.active_ind = 1 and pl.physician_ind = 1 elseif (par1="ALL") from prsnl pl where pl.name_full_formatted != " " and pl.active_ind=1 and pl.physician_ind = 1 else from prsnl pl where pl.physician_ind = 1 and pl.active_ind=1 and cnvtupper(pl.name_full_formatted)=patstring(concat(substring(1,1,par1),"*")) endif pl.name_full_formatted, _hidden=pl.person_id order name_full_formatted

select fld = if (d.seq = 1) "A" elseif (d.seq = 2) "B" elseif (d.seq = 3) "C" elseif (d.seq = 4) "D" elseif (d.seq = 5) "E" elseif (d.seq = 6) "F" elseif (d.seq = 7) "G" elseif (d.seq = 8) "H" elseif (d.seq = 9) "I" elseif (d.seq = 10) "J" elseif (d.seq = 11) "K" elseif (d.seq = 12) "L" elseif (d.seq = 13) "M" elseif (d.seq = 14) "N" elseif (d.seq = 15) "O" elseif (d.seq = 16) "P" elseif (d.seq = 17) "Q" elseif (d.seq = 18) "R" elseif (d.seq = 19) "S" elseif (d.seq = 20) "T" elseif (d.seq = 21) "U" elseif (d.seq = 22) "V" elseif (d.seq = 23) "W" elseif (d.seq = 24) "X" elseif (d.seq = 25) "Y" elseif (d.seq = 26) "Z" elseif (d.seq = 27) "0" elseif (d.seq = 28) "1" elseif (d.seq = 29) "2" elseif (d.seq = 30) "3" elseif (d.seq = 31) "4" elseif (d.seq = 32) "5" elseif (d.seq = 33) "6" elseif (d.seq = 34) "7" elseif (d.seq = 35) "8" elseif (d.seq = 36) "9" elseif (d.seq = 37) "ANY" else "OTHER" ENDIF FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(38))

SELECT IF (PAR1="ANY") SOURCE_STRING = "*ANYTHING", _hidden=0 elseif (PAR1 != "OTHER") SOURCE_STRING=n.source_string, _hidden=n.nomenclature_id, Vocabulary=cv.display FROM nomenclature n, code_value cv PLAN cv WHERE cv.code_set=400 and cv.active_ind=1 and cv.cdf_meaning in ("MUL.ALGCAT", "MUL.DRUG", "ALLERGY") JOIN n WHERE CNVTUPPER(n.source_string) =PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) AND n.source_vocabulary_cd= cv.code_value ORDER cnvtupper(n.source_string) else SOURCE_STRING=n.source_string, _hidden=n.nomenclature_id, Vocabulary=cv.display FROM nomenclature n, code_value cv PLAN cv WHERE cv.code_set=400 and cv.active_ind=1 and cv.cdf_meaning in ("MUL.ALGCAT", "MUL.DRUG", "ALLERGY") JOIN n WHERE cnvtupper(n.source_string)!=" " AND n.source_string NOT BETWEEN "0*" AND "Z*" AND n.source_vocabulary_cd= cv.code_value ORDER cnvtupper(n.source_string) ENDIF

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_INCOMING_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS where order detail ORDER_DETAIL QUALIFIER LIST1 and OPT_LIST2

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ALERT_FLEX_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Send alert OPT_TITLE stating TXT, OPT_CANCEL_LABEL, OPT_IGNORE_LABEL, OPT_OVERRIDE_REASON, OPT_MODIFY_LABEL, OPT_DEFAULT_LABEL, OPT_ORDERS, OPT_DEFAULT_FIRST_ORDER, OPT_URL_BUTTON_NAME, OPT_URL_ADDRESS, OK_BUTTON_NAME, OPT_FORM, OPT_FORM_BUTTON_NAME, OPT_FORCE_FORM, OPT_LINK

statements.statement: select distinct Form_Definition = if (t.seq = 1) dfr.definition else "*NONE" endif, _hidden = if (t.seq = 1) dfr.dcp_forms_ref_id else 0.0 endif, Description = if (t.seq = 1) dfr.description else "NONE" endif from dcp_forms_ref dfr, (dummyt t with seq=2) plan dfr where dfr.active_ind = 1 and textlen(trim(dfr.definition)) > 0 and textlen(trim(dfr.definition)) > 0 join t order Form_Definition

column.value: PowerPorm must be opened, dismiss Alert
PowerForm must be signed, dismiss Alert

values.value: Combivent Respimat CFC free 100 mcg-20 mcg/inh inhalation aerosol
albuterol-ipratropium CFC free 100 mcg-20 mcg/inh inhalation aerosol
vitamins A, D, and E topical
rabies vaccine, purified chick embryo cell
Amino Acids 3%- Dextrose 5%- Ca gluc 625mg- Heparin 125units in 250ml
